definition[0]: a product that is shop-soiled is slightly damaged or dirty because it has been in a shop for a long time
definition[1]: an idea that is shop-soiled is no longer interesting because it has been discussed many times before
definition[2]: shop-soiled goods are slightly damaged or dirty because they have been in a shop for a long time
example[2]: There are greatly reduced one-off prices on goods that are shop-soiled.
